review_title: I love this game, but it's broken
one_reviews_text:
I love this game. It's exactly what I'd love to play on VR but it breaks on all my computers after the review prompt. It locks up after I select review then the game does not work at all again until I uninstall it and reinstall it. 
If anyone knows how to fix that, I'd be pretty excited.
Please fix. This could be a super fun game. <3
